short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to enrich the EarthMC map experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension designed specifically for EarthMC's map website, coming with great multitude of useful and cosmetic features.

- Three map modes
- Archive mode
- Dark mode
- Locate towns, players and nations quickly
- Completely remade the page design
- Information about a player
- View chunks and country borders
